headline: The Hartford Declares Quarterly Dividends Of $0.60 Per Share Of Common Stock And $375 Per Share Of Series G Preferred Stock
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., February 18, 2026--The Hartford’s Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.60 per share of common stock, payable April 2 to common stock shareholders of record at the close of business on March 2.
